MAIN_MENU.INCOMPATIBLE_PREVIEW_SAVE_GAME_MSG: This preview save game is incompatible with this version of Foundation.
MAIN_MENU.INCOMPATIBLE_SAVE_GAME_ONLY_LOAD_PREVIEW: This preview build can only load save games from the same preview build.
MAIN_MENU.WARNING_NON_PREVIEW_SAVE_GAME_OVERWRITIN: Overwriting a non-preview save game will prevent opening it in a non-preview version of Foundation.
MAIN_MENU.SAVE_GAME_TOO_RECENT_MSG: The save game (v{1}) is too recent for this version of Foundation (v{2}).

MAIN_MENU.LOAD_GAME_WRONG_MOD_VERSION: The mod '{1}' is loaded with version {2} (previously {3}).
MAIN_MENU.LOAD_GAME_DELETE_CONFIRMATION: The save game '{1}' will be deleted.
MAIN_MENU.SAVE_GAME_OVERWRITE_CONFIRMATION: The save game '{1}' will be overwritten.
MAIN_MENU.ENTER_NAME_FOR_NEW_SAVEGAME: Please enter a name for your new savegame
MAIN_MENU.MODS_REQUIRE_ATTENTION: Some installed mods require your attention.
MAIN_MENU.COMMUNITY_TRANSLATION: Foundation is translated with the precious contribution of the community. If you would like to contribute to the translation of your language, visit {IMG1}
MAIN_MENU.DISCORD_DESC: Need help or just want to discuss with fellow Foundation players? Join our amazing community on our official Discord server!
MAIN_MENU.FACEBOOK_DESC: The latest news about development of the game, community content and snippets of things to come. Give us a like and follow <3
MAIN_MENU.INSTAGRAM_DESC: Photos, videos and more Foundation media goodness await you on our Instagram!
MAIN_MENU.YOUTUBE_DESC: Not much going on here, tbh ^^​;
MAIN_MENU.TWITTER_DESC: Follow us for tweets on interesting articles, reviews, videos and streams about Foundation.
MAIN_MENU.CROWDIN_DESC: Foundation is translated with the precious contribution of the community. Would you like to contribute for your language?
MAIN_MENU.POLYMORPH_DESC: Our website! Job offers, devlogs, updates and more!

MENU_SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_POPUP.SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_INFO_1.9_INTRO: Anda sedang memainkan versi preview dari update Foundation 1.9 yang akan datang. Oleh karena itu, ada beberapa elemen kunci yang perlu Anda ketahui tentang kompatibilitas savegame.
MENU_SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_POPUP.SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_INFO_1.9_PREVIEW: Saat memainkan pratinjau 1.9, Anda hanya dapat membuat game baru dan memuat savegame yang berasal dari pratinjau ini.
MENU_SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_POPUP.SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_INFO_1.9_RELEASE: Setelah pembaruan 1.9 dirilis, savegame dari pratinjau akan kompatibel dan berfungsi. Meskipun Foundation telah mengalami perubahan signifikan dengan 1.9, tujuan kami adalah membuat savegame dari versi sebelumnya (1.8 dan sebelumnya) juga berfungsi. Dalam beberapa kasus, situasi yang tidak terduga dapat terjadi.
MENU_SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_POPUP.SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_INFO_1.9_MODS: Untuk savegame modifikasi, kompatibilitas mereka tergantung pada mod itu sendiri. Sampai mereka diperbarui ke standar 1.9, mereka dapat menyebabkan bug, inkonsistensi, dan kegagalan untuk dimuat.
MENU_SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_POPUP.SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_INFO_FOOTER: Jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan tentang savegame dan kompatibilitas, kunjungi server Discord Foundation resmi kami dan tanyakan. Selamat bersenang-senang!
MENU_SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_POPUP.SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_INFO_FOOTER_WITH_: Jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan tentang savegame dan kompatibilitas, kunjungi {1} resmi kami dan tanyakan. Selamat bersenang-senang!
MENU_SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_POPUP.SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_1.9RELEASE_INTRO: Foundation telah mengalami perubahan signifikan dengan update terbarunya, 1.9. Oleh karena itu, ada beberapa elemen kunci yang perlu Anda ketahui tentang kompatibilitas savegame.
MENU_SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_POPUP.SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_1.9RELEASE_PREVIE: Savegame dari pratinjau 1.9 seharusnya kompatibel dan berfungsi.
MENU_SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_POPUP.SAVEGAME_COMPATIBILITY_1.9RELEASE_1.8_EA: Savegame dari versi sebelumnya (1.8 dan sebelumnya) seharusnya juga berfungsi meskipun, dalam beberapa kasus, situasi yang tidak terduga dapat terjadi. Juga, perlu dicatat bahwa pencapaian dinonaktifkan pada savegame lama karena penataan kemajuan.

MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.HILLS_MAP_DESC: The Hills map features dense forests, green pastures and a rounded landscape like no other. The absence of fishing can make it more challenging to feed the population.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.FLUVIAL_MAP_DESC: The Fluvial map features long stretches of river that split the land. Bridges must be built earlier to allow passage across rivers for villagers, traders and immigrants alike.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.COASTAL_MAP_DESC: The Coastal map has it all: idyllic beachfront coves, protected by cliffs, whilst inland the rolling hills and plains are ideal for settling and farming.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.MOUNTAIN_MAP_DESC: The Mountain map offers a small coastal stretch of land with rough elevated terrain at your back that will challenge your establishment.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.VALLEY_MAP_DESC: At its core, the Valley map is a sinuous river running through lush forest and surrounded by ancient mountains, that is sure to please.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.COASTAL_GEN_MAP_DESC: A procedurally generated Coastal map. Sandy islets and steep islands dot its sea, whereas ridges and beaches bound the mainland, leading up to frequent lush hills and imperious mountains.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.FLUVIAL_GEN_MAP_DESC: A procedurally generated Fluvial map. Its pleasant hills are divided by a powerful river, which sometimes permits islets alongside its shore of fertile lowland and ragged cliffs.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.HILLS_GEN_MAP_DESC: A procedurally generated Hills map. It features green pastoral hills of varying heights, large forested valleys and numerous cliff types. Fishes can sometimes be found within its small elevated lakes.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.NO_MAP_DESC: No description has been provided for this map, yet.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.TRICKY_TERRAIN_DESC: May require costly bridges and more expansion to overcome terrain elevation and/or obstacles.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.MAP_RESOURCES_MISSING_DESC: This map contains all resources except {1}.
MENU_MAP_SELECTOR.PROCEDURAL_MAPS_TOOLTIP_CONTENT:
Procedural maps are randomly generated maps that will make each game a unique experience.

The map generator is still a work in progress. For the moment, we propose 3 different variants of the generator, inspired by some of the original maps already present in the game: Coastal, Fluvial and Hills.

Several features are planned for the future such as more map types, customization through a set of adjustable parameters, improved vegetation, and elevated rivers.

We are looking for feedback on this initial iteration. Join our Discord and tell us what you think!

MENU_GENERAL_SETTINGS.LANGUAGE_LOCKED_TO_ENGLISH: Only English is available in this build.
MENU_GENERAL_SETTINGS.USER_INTERFACE_SCALE_WARNING: User Interface Scale is above the recommended scale ({1}) for the current resolution.
MENU_GENERAL_SETTINGS.AUTOMATIC_DOWNSCALING: To allow the game interface to fit on-screen, the interface scale has been adjusted automatically.

MENU_CONTROL_REMAPPER_SETTINGS.REMAPPER_MESSAGE_1: Left-click an input to reassign. ESC to cancel.
MENU_CONTROL_REMAPPER_SETTINGS.RESTORE_DEFAULTS_WARNING_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to restore all controls to their default values? This action cannot be undone.
MENU_CONTROL_REMAPPER_SETTINGS.CONTROL_UNASSIGNED_TOOLTIP: Leaving this control unassigned might hinder your experience of the game.
MENU_CONTROL_REMAPPER_SETTINGS.CONFLICTS_POPUP_MESSAGE: The newest controls for the game conflict with the current key binding configuration. Would you like to restore defaults or adjust them manually?

MENU_MODS.MODS_DISABLED_IN_BUILD: Mods are disabled in this build

MENU_MODS_INSTALLED.CANNOT_LOAD_MOD: The mod could not be loaded. Please consult the logs for additional information.

MENU_MODS_BROWSER.REPORT_MOD_POPUP_CONTENT:
Are you experiencing technical issues with a specific mod? We recommend visiting the comment section of the mod's webpage first to contact the author.

The friendly people in the mod support channel of the Foundation Discord server may also provide additional help.

For inappropriate content, we suggest using the mod.io report tool instead.

MENU_MODS_BROWSER_INSTALLATION.FAILED_RETRIEVE_X_MOD_DEPENDENCIES: Failed to retrieve mod information for {1} of the dependency mods
MENU_MODS_BROWSER_INSTALLATION.CANNOT_LOAD_INSTALLED_MOD: Mod "{1}" has been installed, but could not be loaded. Please consult the logs for additional information.
MENU_MODS_BROWSER_INSTALLATION.MODIO_ERROR_WITH_CODE_X: An error happened while fetching the mod {1} from mod.io (response code: {2}).
MENU_MODS_BROWSER_INSTALLATION.MODIO_INVALID_FILE: The downloaded mod file is invalid. Please try again.
MENU_MODS_BROWSER_INSTALLATION.EXTRACTION_FAILED: Extraction failed. Consult the logs for more info.

MENU_MODS_DEPENDENCIES.MOD_X_REQUIRES_DEPENDENCIES: The mod "{1}" requires the following mods to work properly. Please select all the dependencies you want to install.

MENU_MOD_PRIORITY.CANNOT_LOAD_MOD_BEFORE_DEPENDENCY: Cannot load a mod before its dependency
MENU_MOD_PRIORITY.MOD_MISSING: This mod is missing (not installed or loaded)
MENU_MOD_PRIORITY.MOD_DEPENDENCIES_REQUIRED: This mod requires other mods to function properly.
MENU_MOD_PRIORITY.MOD_NO_DEPENDENCY_REQUIRED: This standalone mod has no dependency.
MENU_MOD_PRIORITY.NO_MODS_FOUND_FOR_SELECTION: No mods found. If you wish to play with mods, first visit the Mods section in the Main menu.
